about_the_game:
Undead fortress is a simple and pure first-person shooter game that tests players' shooting reflexes and upgrade combinations.

Players take on the role of a survivor in a post-apocalyptic world, constantly fighting against the pursuit of bio-armies and zombie waves, searching for supplies and strengthening their own chip abilities.

Game features:

  • Challenging opponents:

    Bio-armies can use various firearms, engage in hand-to-hand combat, and throw grenades. Zombies get stronger over time, with invisible enemies and missile enemies, and more.

  • Level objectives:

    Use map resources wisely to survive until the end.

    Gain resources for each enemy killed, double rewards for victories.

    Each additional second survived adds extra loot.

  • Chip upgrades:

    Can have 4 types of chips to strengthen themselves and improve combat effectiveness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon R9 380X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
